snippet: An independent review has flagged thousands of cases for possible flaws in the foreclosure process at the nation's largest mortgage servicers.
abstract: An independent review has flagged thousands of cases for possible flaws in the foreclosure process at the nation's largest mortgage servicers.

byline.original: By NELSON D. SCHWARTZ and JESSICA SILVER-GREENBERG

headline.main: Review Finds Possible Flaws in More Than 138,000 Bank Foreclosures
